alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Ouachita; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 11:28AM CDT until May 11 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Caldwell Parish in north central Louisiana... Southeastern Union Parish in north central Louisiana... Ouachita Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until noon CDT. * At 1128 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Claiborne to 8 miles southwest of Richwood to 9 miles northwest of Clarks, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monroe, Claiborne, West Monroe, Swartz, Brownsville-Bawcom, Brownsville-Bawcomville, Richwood, Sterlington, Drew, Fondale, Fairbanks, Perryville, Bosco, Riverton, Millhaven, Pine Grove, Guthrie and Cheniere. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for north central Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for north central Louisiana.
